ABout Me

Let me tell u few things....

Bio

Hello my name is Kushagra Kumar Sinha a 2nd year student currently pursuing B.tech in Electrical Engineering in NIT raipur.Though I am pursuing electrical engineering ,I have keen interest in computer programming and am aiming for a career in software development.If we speak about hobbies i also like to indulge myself in music and also enjoy sports.

Early education

I did my 10th standard from Guru Kripa Divine grace Public School which is situated in a city named Bahraich which is situated in Uttar Pradesh,India.I thoroughly enjoyed my school life and also tried to learn various lessons and skills which helped me progress.I passed my 10th standard with 85.8 percentage marks.

previous college

I also studied in Indian Institute Of Information Technology Una for a year before joining my current college. The year 2021 was full of difficulties for me as i was preparing for my second attempt i was affected by covid and had severe effects.Due to this i could not complete my preparation and had to appear for the exam partially prepared .This resulted in me joining this college.

current college

Due to many monetory and personal reasons i had to drop out from my previous college and I started to prepare for reappearing in JEE to get into one of the NITs. This preparation got me into NIT raipur which is my current college.
